name: insomnia-plugin-randomuksortcode
description: Generate random UK bank sort codes inside the Insomnia REST client

insomnia.name: randomUKSortCode
insomnia.description: Generate a random UK bank sort code.

scripts.test: xo && nyc ava && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > coverage.lcov && codecov -t c784eef3-fd67-430b-bf61-f37e83d19ac8
scripts.prepare: husky install && shx rm -rf .git/hooks && shx ln -s ../.husky .git/hooks

author: SavageCore
